inputs.name: first-radio-element
inputs.title: Do you want to add service scope to your Solution page?
inputs.clarification: Service scope is 4 parts. You can include as many or few as you wish. Sections that leave blank will not be displayed on your Solution page.

dependants.name: extention-support
dependants.title: 1. Is your service an add-on or extension to other software services?

options.label: Yes, but can also be used as a standalone service

dependants.title: What other software services is your service an extension to?
dependants.placeholder: Really Kool Document Manager is one of the most popular document management suites in the UK.
